<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamreader">BinaryStreamReader</a> SrcReader(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9db8c44b250b90e3ab7e4d144e7c9c2ea60baadb22e80b147e4885ad16760e569">Ref</a>.slice(0, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is a bit tricky.  If we just call readBytes, we are requiring that it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// return us the entire stream as a contiguous buffer.  There is no guarantee</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this can be satisfied by returning a reference straight from the buffer, as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an implementation may not store all data in a single contiguous buffer.  So</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we iterate over each contiguous chunk, writing each one in succession.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcReader.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamreader/#a81b49f753bf7db44da6cf4b0fc59b76e">bytesRemaining</a>() &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a> Chunk;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EC = SrcReader.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamreader/#aa580bf8bd5d8f755f546fa9df986260b">readLongestContiguousChunk</a>(Chunk))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EC;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EC = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#abb614d7e749a1af26c1d719b28ba4fb7">writeBytes</a>(Chunk))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EC;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t NewOffset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#a2e5692e307aba4f86e263a7d20695432">Offset</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t ZerosSize = 64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Zeros&#91;ZerosSize&#93; = &#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#a2e5692e307aba4f86e263a7d20695432">Offset</a> &lt; NewOffset)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> E = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#a1e5febb5c471f88c785519a211871b01">writeArray</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;char&gt;</a>(Zeros, std::min(ZerosSize, NewOffset - <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#a2e5692e307aba4f86e263a7d20695432">Offset</a>))))</span></CodeLine>
